verbs.description: Trump World [V: ca] n't even throw a dishonest tantrum about an imaginary problem without screwing up in important ways .
[ARG0: Trump World] [ARGM-MOD: ca] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARGM-ADV: even] [V: throw] [ARG1: a dishonest tantrum] [ARG2: about an imaginary problem] [ARGM-MNR: without screwing up in important ways] .
[ARG1: Trump World] ca n't even throw a dishonest tantrum about an imaginary problem without [V: screwing] up [ARGM-MNR: in important ways] .
